rows.label: tlk43100143_02_msg0001
rows.name:
My dad's a mercenary. He
does jobs all over Alst.

rows.label: tlk43100143_02_msg0002
rows.name:
When he goes somewhere, he usually
brings me back a Core Chip.

rows.label: tlk43100143_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Some day I'll have a Blade of my
own to give all my chips to!

rows.label: tlk43100143_02_msg0004
rows.name:
But...Core Chips get used up
once you've used them, right?

rows.label: tlk43100143_02_msg0005
rows.name:
So it's a bit of a waste if
you just give them abilities
they've already got.

rows.label: tlk43100143_02_msg0006
rows.name:
Best to give 'em one that'll improve
just the one that you want.
